summary: New project with on-screen joystick movement and shoot button controls

existing_features.title: Update the touch controls overlay so that, during gameplay when touch controls are shown, the SHOOT button renders on the bottom-left and the joystick renders on the bottom-right to match the uploaded reference image.

Adjust the shoot button visuals to match the reference image more closely: show the label text as "SHOOT" (not "FIRE") and ensure the overall button reads as a bright neon-magenta/pink circular control with clear icon+label contrast.

Adjust the joystick visuals to match the reference image more closely: ensure the joystick reads as a bright neon-cyan/teal circular base with a distinct inner knob, preserving existing drag/clamp behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add on-screen controls: virtual joystick for movement and a shoot button (with adjustable size/location)

projectName: Match on-screen joystick and shoot button layout/styling to reference image
